nodes.text: Falch was a male Human Private of the Rift Alliance Coalition Forces living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was stationed on Hoth under Lieutenant Felix Iresso along with Cawelyn, Marren Dask, Tsalesh, Kree, Lavik and Zaun. Together they assisted the Barsen'thor in defeating the White Maw pirate Valon.
Private Falch appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Consular class mission on Hoth.
